# SEQ20 Instructions

## Description
Sequence 20 focuses on gradients and connection of space

## Category
Buildings

## Patterns
apl132, apl133, apl134, apl135, apl136, apl137, apl138, apl139, apl140, apl141, apl142

## Emergent Phenomena
Spatial sequences that create privacy gradients and support different types of activities

## Overview
This sequence contains 11 pattern(s) that work together to create the emergent phenomena described above.
